name: “Hideout” - New Inter-Species Relations
description: “Hideout”- New Inter-Species Relations - Video Art and Site-Specific.- Caró. Hideout is a cartography and a space-time-oriented menhir in the state of exception already inherent in our times. creating a narrative that is located at the intersection of reality and fiction, mixing several records of reality from different contexts in a single space of time. Beginnings and ends overlap, creating a context that allows new ecosystems and inter-species relationships to emerge in the Anthropocene.
